mdRecord.dcterms:title: Painful occurrence: We understand that Professor Davis of the University of Virginia, was shot by an unknown hand, with a pistol, in front of his dwelling, on Thursday night, about 6 o'clock
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Text consists of a one-paragraph report, citing the Charlottesville Va. Advocate. [original]
The issue also contains (p. 1, col. 5) a report on the current University of Virginia session, signed in print, by J.A.G. Davis. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Framed. Deposit of Albert Small, January, 2007. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Framed. Deposit of Albert Small, January, 2007. [original]
